name: event-manager-landing-page
description: Event Manager Landing Page with Strapi CMS and Next.js Frontend

scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd backend && yarn install && cd ../frontend && yarn install
scripts.dev:npm: concurrently "npm run -w backend dev" "npm run -w frontend dev"
scripts.build:npm: npm run -w backend build && npm run -w frontend build
scripts.start:npm: concurrently "npm run -w backend start" "npm run -w frontend start"
